paper_title: Ext-analogues of Gan--Gross--Prasad models vanish for tempered representations
abstract: In this paper we prove that Ext-analogues of Gan--Gross--Prasad models vanish for tempered representations, as conjectured by D. Prasad. In particular, this implies a conjectural Euler--Poincar√© characteristic formula for the Gan--Gross--Prasad models.
